name: CC98 Fonts Style
css:
@-moz-document domain("www.cc98.org") {
/* The font! */
#root,
.mainPageTitle1,
.mainPageTitle1 a,
.mainPageTitle2,
.mainPageTitle2 a,
.mainPageCountTitle,
.schoolNewsTitle a,
.recommendedReadingTitle,
.recommendedFunctionTitle a,
.recommendedReadingAbstract,
.mainPageListBoardName a,
.mainPageListTitle a,
.mainPageCountContent,
.topBarText a,
.topBarCC98 a,
.topBarUserName,
.topBarUserCenter-mainPage,
.topBarMessageDetails-mainPage a,
.user-center,
.boardName2,
.areaName,
.areaName a,
.boardInfo,
.topicInfo-info,
.substance,
.userMessageOpt,
.userMessage-userName,
.operation1,
.changeEditor,
.button,
.focus-board-area .focus-board,
.footerRow,
.footerRow a,
.reply .reply-floor-lz,
.reply .reply-floor,
.page-link,
textarea,
.hiddenImage,
.createTopicListName,
.createTopicTitle input,
.createTopic,
#search .searchBoxSelect {
	font-family: sans-serif !important;
	font-weight: normal;
}

.topBarText a,
.topBarCC98 a,
.mainPageTitle1,
.mainPageTitle2,
.mainPageTitle1 a,
.mainPageTitle2 a,
.recommendedFunctionTitle a {
	font-weight: bold;
}

/* 吐槽：无法理解为什么 98 站务组写了这么多极其细节化的 class，并且都强制他们的字体为微软雅黑 */
}
